Use common sense and move your saves out of the location you found them, delete that directory entirely, then start the game and make a new save. 

Then just search for the filenames they would have. Once you find one with the right filenames, check the date on them. If they were made just after you saved, they are the correct ones. And you should be able to copy the old saves in and continue playing.
